name: Minigame Mash
description:
The space bar is the only button you need! Mash away to beat your minigame as they continue to get harder and harder. There are a total of six different games, try to beat them all. 

This game was created for the WeeklyGameJam week 165: One Button Mash.

Everything was made in a week, so it may have some  bugs/issues. Feel free to tell me about them in the comments.
